mapper.select: select n.notice_id, n.customs_id, n.title, coalesce(n.content, '') as content, n.create_at, n.type, c.id as c_id, c.name from Notice n left join Customs c on n.customs_id = c.id where n.type = 'NOTICE' order by n.notice_id desc
